##   [8] "  <script src=\"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@5.16.0/dist/d3.min.js\"></script>"                                                                                                                 
##   [9] "  <script src=\"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/locuszoom@0.14.0/dist/locuszoom.app.min.js\"></script>"

##  [13] "  <script src=\"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/locuszoom@0.14.0/dist/ext/lz-parsers.min.js\"></script>"                                                                                              
##  [14] "  <script src=\"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/locuszoom@0.14.0/dist/ext/lz-tabix-source.min.js\"></script>"                                                                                         
##  [15] "  <title>LocusZoom.js</title>"                                                                                                                                                                     
##  [16] "  <style>"                                                                                                                                                                                         
##  [17] "    body {"                                                                                                                                                                                        
##  [18] "      background-color: #FAFAFA;"

##  [20] "    }"

##  [22] "      max-width: 100%;"                                                                                                                                                                            
##  [23] "      box-sizing: border-box;"                                                                                                                                                                     
##  [24] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                             
##  [25] "    div.example > a > h6 {"                                                                                                                                                                        
##  [26] "      margin-bottom: 0.5em;"                                                                                                                                                                       
##  [27] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                             
##  [28] "    div.example > a > img {"                                                                                                                                                                       
##  [29] "      border: 1px solid #8A8A8A;"                                                                                                                                                                  
##  [30] "      margin-bottom: 1.4em;"                                                                                                                                                                       
##  [31] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                             
##  [32] "  </style>"                                                                                                                                                                                        
##  [33] "</head>"                                                                                                                                                                                           
##  [34] "<body>"                                                                                                                                                                                            
##  [35] "  <div class=\"container\">"                                                                                                                                                                       
##  [36] "    <div class=\"row\">"                                                                                                                                                                           
##  [37] "      <div class=\"three columns\">"                                                                                                                                                               
##  [38] "        <h2>Protein-pQTLs</h2>"                                                                                                                                                                    
##  [39] "        <ul class=\"top_hits\" style=\"padding-left: 0.2rem; min-width: 110px;\"></ul>"                                                                                                            
##  [40] "      </div>"                                                                                                                                                                                      
##  [41] "      <div class=\"ten columns\">"                                                                                                                                                                 
##  [42] "        <div id=\"lz-plot\" class=\"lz-container-responsive\"></div>"                                                                                                                              
##  [43] "      </div>"                                                                                                                                                                                      
##  [44] "    </div>"                                                                                                                                                                                        
##  [45] "  </div>"                                                                                                                                                                                          
##  [46] "  <script src=\"caprion_dr.js\"></script>"                                                                                                                                                         
##  [47] "  <script type=\"text/javascript\">"                                                                                                                                                               
##  [48] "  const gwasParser = LzParsers.makeGWASParser({"                                                                                                                                                   
##  [49] "      chrom_col: 1,"                                                                                                                                                                               
##  [50] "      pos_col: 2,"                                                                                                                                                                                 
##  [51] "      ref_col: 4,"                                                                                                                                                                                 
##  [52] "      alt_col: 5,"                                                                                                                                                                                 
##  [53] "      pvalue_col: 6,"                                                                                                                                                                              
##  [54] "      is_neg_log_pvalue: true,"                                                                                                                                                                    
##  [55] "      beta_col: 7,"                                                                                                                                                                                
##  [56] "      stderr_beta_col: 8"                                                                                                                                                                          
##  [57] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                             
##  [58] "  const bedParser = LzParsers.makeBed12Parser({normalize: true});"                                                                                                                                 
##  [59] "  const ldParser = LzParsers.makePlinkLdParser({normalize: true});"                                                                                                                                
##  [60] "  var apiBase = \"https://portaldev.sph.umich.edu/api/v1/\";"                                                                                                                                      
##  [61] "  const AssociationLZ = LocusZoom.Adapters.get('AssociationLZ');"                                                                                                                                  
##  [62] "  var data_sources = new LocusZoom.DataSources()"                                                                                                                                                  
##  [63] "//.add(\"assoc\", [\"AssociationLZ\", { url: apiBase + \"statistic/single/\", source: 45 }])"                                                                                                      
##  [64] "  .add(\"assoc\", [\"TabixUrlSource\", {url_data: 'https://locuszoom-web-demos.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/tabix-demo/gwas_giant-bmi_meta_women-only.gz', parser_func: gwasParser, overfetch: 0 }])"
##  [65] "  .add(\"credset\", [\"CredibleSetLZ\", { threshold: 0.95, significance_threshold: 7.301 }])"                                                                                                      
##  [66] "  .add(\"catalog\", [\"GwasCatalogLZ\", { url: apiBase + 'annotation/gwascatalog/results/', build: 'GRCh37' }])"                                                                                   
##  [67] "  .add(\"ld\", [\"LDServer\", { url: \"https://portaldev.sph.umich.edu/ld/\", source: '1000G', build: 'GRCh37', population: 'ALL' }])"                                                             
##  [68] "//.add(\"ld\", [\"UserTabixLD\", { url_data: 'https://locuszoom-web-demos.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/tabix-demo/plink.ld.tab.gz', parser_func: ldParser }])"                                       
##  [69] "  .add(\"gene\", [\"GeneLZ\", { url: apiBase + \"annotation/genes/\", build: 'GRCh37' }])"                                                                                                         
##  [70] "  .add(\"recomb\", [\"RecombLZ\", { url: apiBase + \"annotation/recomb/results/\", build: 'GRCh37' }])"                                                                                            
##  [71] "  .add(\"constraint\", [\"GeneConstraintLZ\", { url: \"https://gnomad.broadinstitute.org/api/\", build: 'GRCh37' }]);"                                                                             
##  [72] "  var stateUrlMapping = {chr: \"chrom\", start: \"start\", end: \"end\", ldrefvar: 'ld_variant' };"                                                                                                
##  [73] "  var initialState = LzDynamicUrls.paramsFromUrl(stateUrlMapping);"                                                                                                                                
##  [74] "  if (!Object.keys(initialState).length) {"                                                                                                                                                        
##  [75] "    initialState = {chr: '16', start: 53609247, end: 54009247 };"                                                                                                                                  
##  [76] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                               
##  [77] "  const layout = LocusZoom.Layouts.get(\"plot\", \"standard_association\", {"                                                                                                                      
##  [78] "      state: initialState,"                                                                                                                                                                        
##  [79] "      panels: ["                                                                                                                                                                                   
##  [80] "          LocusZoom.Layouts.get('panel', 'association', { title: { text: \"GIANT BMI meta-analysis (women only)\" }}),"                                                                            
##  [81] "          LocusZoom.Layouts.get('panel', 'annotation_catalog', { title: { text: \"GWAS catalog\" }}),"                                                                                             
##  [82] "          LocusZoom.Layouts.get('panel', 'annotation_credible_set'),"                                                                                                                              
##  [83] "          LocusZoom.Layouts.get('panel', 'genes' ),"                                                                                                                                               
##  [84] "      ],"                                                                                                                                                                                          
##  [85] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                             
##  [86] "  var plot = LocusZoom.populate(\"#lz-plot\", data_sources, layout);"                                                                                                                              
##  [87] "  plot.applyState({ chr: '16', start: 53609247, end: 54009247, ldrefvar: \"\" });"                                                                                                                 
##  [88] "  LzDynamicUrls.plotUpdatesUrl(plot, stateUrlMapping);"                                                                                                                                            
##  [89] "  LzDynamicUrls.plotUpdatesUrl(plot, stateUrlMapping);"                                                                                                                                            
##  [90] "  function jumpTo(region) {"                                                                                                                                                                       
##  [91] "    var target = region.split(\":\");"                                                                                                                                                             
##  [92] "    var chr = target[0];"                                                                                                                                                                          
##  [93] "    var pos = target[1];"                                                                                                                                                                          
##  [94] "    var no = target[2]"                                                                                                                                                                            
##  [95] "    var ppid = target[3]"                                                                                                                                                                          
##  [96] "    var start = 0;"                                                                                                                                                                                
##  [97] "    var end = 0;"                                                                                                                                                                                  
##  [98] "    if (!pos.match(/[-+]/)) {"                                                                                                                                                                     
##  [99] "      start = +pos - 250000;"                                                                                                                                                                      
## [100] "      end = +pos + 250000"                                                                                                                                                                         
## [101] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                             
## [102] "    var new_data_sources = new LocusZoom.DataSources()"                                                                                                                                            
## [103] "    .add(\"assoc\", [\"StaticJSON\", { data: input[no].data } ])"                                                                                                                                  
## [104] "    .add(\"credset\", [\"CredibleSetLZ\", { threshold: 0.95, significance_threshold: 7.301 }])"                                                                                                    
## [105] "    .add(\"catalog\", [\"GwasCatalogLZ\", { url: apiBase + 'annotation/gwascatalog/results/', build: 'GRCh37' }])"                                                                                 
## [106] "    .add(\"ld\", [\"LDServer\", { url: \"https://portaldev.sph.umich.edu/ld/\", source: '1000G', build: 'GRCh37', population: 'ALL' }])"                                                           
## [107] "    .add(\"gene\", [\"GeneLZ\", { url: apiBase + \"annotation/genes/\", build: 'GRCh37' }])"                                                                                                       
## [108] "    .add(\"recomb\", [\"RecombLZ\", { url: apiBase + \"annotation/recomb/results/\", build: 'GRCh37' }])"                                                                                          
## [109] "    .add(\"constraint\", [\"GeneConstraintLZ\", { url: \"https://gnomad.broadinstitute.org/api/\", build: 'GRCh37' }]);"                                                                           
## [110] "    var new_stateUrlMapping = {chr: \"chrom\", start: \"start\", end: \"end\", ldrefvar: 'ld_variant' };"                                                                                          
## [111] "    var new_initialState = LzDynamicUrls.paramsFromUrl(new_stateUrlMapping);"                                                                                                                      
## [112] "    if (!Object.keys(new_initialState).length) {"                                                                                                                                                  
## [113] "      new_initialState = {chr: chr, start: start, end: end};"                                                                                                                                      
## [114] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                             
## [115] "    const new_layout = LocusZoom.Layouts.get(\"plot\", \"standard_association\", {"                                                                                                                
## [116] "        state: new_initialState,"                                                                                                                                                                  
## [117] "        panels: ["                                                                                                                                                                                 
## [118] "            LocusZoom.Layouts.get('panel', 'association', { title: { text: ppid }}),"                                                                                                              
## [119] "            LocusZoom.Layouts.get('panel', 'annotation_catalog', { title: { text: \"GWAS catalog\" }}),"                                                                                           
## [120] "            LocusZoom.Layouts.get('panel', 'annotation_credible_set'),"                                                                                                                            
## [121] "            LocusZoom.Layouts.get('panel', 'genes' ),"                                                                                                                                             
## [122] "        ],"                                                                                                                                                                                        
## [123] "    });"                                                                                                                                                                                           
## [124] "    plot = LocusZoom.populate(\"#lz-plot\", new_data_sources, new_layout);"                                                                                                                        
## [125] "    plot.applyState({ chr: chr, start: start, end: end, ldrefvar: \"\" });"                                                                                                                        
## [126] "    LzDynamicUrls.plotUpdatesUrl(plot, new_stateUrlMapping);"                                                                                                                                      
## [127] "    LzDynamicUrls.plotUpdatesUrl(plot, new_stateUrlMapping);"                                                                                                                                      
## [128] "    return false;"                                                                                                                                                                                 
## [129] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                               
## [130] "  var top_hits = ["                                                                                                                                                                                
## [131] "    [\"A1BG\", \"rs145685027\", \"19:58948122\", \"0\"],"                                                                                                                                          
## [132] "    [\"ACE\", \"rs4353\", \"17:61570422\", \"1\"]"                                                                                                                                                 
## [133] "  ];"                                                                                                                                                                                              
## [134] "  top_hits.forEach(function (hit) {"                                                                                                                                                               
## [135] "    var ppid = hit[0] + \"-\" + hit[1];"                                                                                                                                                           
## [136] "    var hits = hit[2] + \":\" + hit[3] + \":\" + ppid;"                                                                                                                                            
## [137] "    d3.select(\"ul.top_hits\").append(\"li\")"                                                                                                                                                     
## [138] "      .html(\"<a href=\\\"javascript:void(0);\\\" onclick=\\\"javascript:jumpTo('\" + hits + \"');\\\">\" + ppid + \"</a>\");"                                                                     
## [139] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                             
## [140] "</script>"                                                                                                                                                                                         
## [141] "</body>"                                                                                                                                                                                           
## [142] "</html>"
